backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, admin-restricted employee and leave management, backed by access control mixin and map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring authentication gate, profile setup logic, mobile layout, and route definitions using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access‑denied message with option to sign in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting a first‑time user to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/common/ConfirmDi: Reusable confirmation dialog with cancel/confirm actions and loading state.
frontend/src/components/employees/AddEmp: Dialog for adding a new employee with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header displaying app branding and current user profile with login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Mobile bottom navigation bar with active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileLay: Mobile-friendly layout wrapper with header, content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/leaves/EditLeave: Dialog for editing an existing leave entry with date and type selection.
frontend/src/components/leaves/LeaveResu: List of leave records with employee info and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated/anonymous backend actors with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, employees, and leave entries via the actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/export/csv.ts: Exports leave records and employee data to a downloadable CSV file.
frontend/src/lib/leaves/monthlySummary.t: Groups leave entries by month and returns a sorted monthly summary.
frontend/src/lib/mappers/leaveType.ts: Maps leave types to labels and vice versa for display and parsing.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AddLeavePage.tsx: UI page for creating a new leave entry, with form handling and submission.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeLeaveHistoryP: Displays an employee’s leave history, monthly summary, and CSV export option.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeesPage.tsx: Shows a list of employees with navigation to history and a dialog for adding new employees.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing quick stats and action shortcuts for leave and employee management.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a leave record search page with employee selection, date filtering, result display, and CSV export. Fetches employees and leaves, applies filters, and shows results after search trigger.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both standard and hash-based routing. Includes helpers for storing and retrieving session values safely.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries. Extends theme tokens for UI consistency across the app.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including features, requirements, architecture notes, and image needs for an admin-only Android leave management app. Tracks implemented features and metadata.
